title: Dangerous Curves
description: Would you recognize the signs of scoliosis — an abnormal curvature of the spine — in your child, and if your child has the problem, how do you choose among the many treatment options available?Scoliosis starts when you’re young and lasts a lifetime, but early detection and treatment can make a difference. Learn to recognize the outward signs of abnormal curvature of the spine, so you can explore short- and long-term treatment options and find the one that’s best for you.
author: Betty Dobson
